p: Tissue homogenates were performed in phosphate buffered saline (PBS) solution and directly used for co-extraction of total DNA and RNA with the DNeasy tissue and blood kit (Qiagen, Germany), according to the manufactures instructions. Nucleic acids were extracted in a separate laboratory and after quantification in a Nanodrop 2000c (Thermoscientific) were kept at −80 °C until analysed. According to the organ availability, lung, liver or spleen tissue extracts were prepared as previously described [ 32], stored at −20 °C and later used for specific Ab detection.
